item.title: Dr Anna Xambó - keynote, paper and performance at ICLC2025
BSc student Stanley Parker wins a hackathon
item.description: BlueCrabs team at the Open Sea Lab 4.0 Hackathon Crab Alert: Hackathon team builds award-winning early warning system for invasive species. Stanley Parker, a third-year BSc Creative Computing student at the School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science, recently took part in Open Sea Lab 4.0, a prestigious international hackathon focused on ocean innovation.
